title: Lag spikes, league crashing???
body: I keep katching lag spikes, ive never had issues with this. I have a great internet provider and a good computer. League after the update has just been off. I constantly skip around like im glitching. Anyone els having this issue?

replies.body: Having it all the time right now.

Well, since patches only change local files inside of your League directory, they're extremely unlikely to cause issues with your connection. Let's take a look at some network setting changes that may resolve this in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). I definitely think that would be a great place to start.

Let me know if this helped.
